name: Get Together!
description:
Get Together!

Get together is a game about sharing the love. Group the little humans together to help out the others feeling down on their luck!

Made with love for the #gmtkjam.

Gameplay

Select the little humans and send them on their way to group up with their friends. Form circles around the gloomy ones to show them that they are not alone! Form chains long enough to loop around the sad little humans and connect the ends to give them the boost they need ♥

Careful, two chains of little humans cannot join together (they're not good at logistics).

KeyActionLeft Mouse Select a little human, and pair with another while selected.Right MouseDeselect the current little human.SpacebarDissolve the chain of the selected human.EscapeToggle the helpful controls window.RReload the scene with new little humans and new troubles. Credits

Thanks to Antti Luode for the musical piece "Broken Tamagotchi" 💛
